Universal Sunday Legislation 

     History will be repeated. False religion will be exalted. The first day of the week, a common working day, 
                                                                           135
possessing no sanctity whatever, will be set up as was the image of Babylon. All nations and tongues and peoples will be commanded to worship this spurious sabbath. . . . The decree enforcing the worship of this day is to go forth to all the world.--7BC 976 (1897).
